text: @realDonaldTrump @EricTrump @LouDobbs Wtf are you talking about ancient history? We're in a pandemic & you're calling it a hoax! Trying to deflect off your piss poor leadership won't work. You worried about bailing out your buds before getting healthcare & equipment to sick people. TRUMPVIRUS. You are the hoax.
